Text.Page:
Despite being cut off from Kaiator, we're continuing our research efforts.

We must understand the nature of cyasma to determine its impact on the war effort. Please collect a half dozen cylinders and bring them here.

Many thanks.

This cyasma is rich with energy and matter.

Its ubiquitousness indicates it may be a fundamental part of the argons' existence.

We're in your debt.
Cyasma cylinders are plentiful outside of {@Rgn:76001}.
